name: Super Pork
description:
Super Pork: Save the Planet Earth

                                                       

An old style shooter

with a Flying Pig as main character  

where you have to save the world from the aliens (what a twist, uhm?)

GAME CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
SPACEBAR or L to shoot
V or K to DODGE
GAMEPAD
D-PAD /Analog Stick to move
A or Right Trigger to shoot
Y or Left Trigger to Dodge

If you like the game, please consider making a donation, or just let us know what you think about it!

You can also play the game on Kongregate
